issue.title: N4424 Inline Variables, N4147 Inline variables, or encapsulated expressions
issue.submitter: Hal Finkel, Richard Smith, David Krauss

discussion.p: Discussed in Urbana. EWG encouraged solving the problem, and wanted the shared constants to be separated from expression aliases, so that the former can be solved sooner than the latter.
N4424 was discussed in Lenexa and accepted by EWG. The authors are encouraged to take a wording paper to CWG.
